description.value: After the silver dragon uses its Cold Breath, freezing fog surrounds it. While the dragonâ€™s Cold Breath is unavailable, each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[restrained]{restrained} until the start of its next turn.
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a save, it can choose to succeed instead.
The dragon uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace its Bite attack with a use of Paralyzing Breath, if available.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Every creature of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]â€™s choice within 120 ft. of it must succeed on a [[/save]] save or become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect for itself on a success. If a creatureâ€™s save succeeds or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]â€™s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The dragon magically transforms into a Beast or Humanoid that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form, which is Dragon. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying transforms with it or is borne by the new form (the dragonâ€™s choice). It reverts to its true form if it dies. In a new form, the dragon retains its Legendary Resistance trait and its HP, ability to speak, proficiencies, and INT, WIS, and CHA scores, as well as this bonus action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] automatically detects every creature and trap within 30 feet of it, pinpointing the current location of each.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] roars at up to two creatures of its choice within 120 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a [[/save]] save or be vulnerable to cold damage until the end of its next turn. A target resistant to cold damage isnâ€™t resistant to it for the duration. A target immune to cold damage is still immune to it, even if the target fails the save.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save]] save or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can then fly up to half its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
